title: naDaiyaip-pAraDi oyyAra
sahitya:
naDaiyaip-pAraDi oyyAra
			(khaNDa naDai)


anupallavi

  lAkavam Ana oru kaiyilE villum nANETri vaittadO cintaiyinai aLLum tU veN mati 
vadanam tuLLu naghai koLLum tuLLu naghai koLLu munnam uLLamadai aLLi viDum


caraNam    shaDaiyai punaindirukki adan mElE taNNoLi makuTam vaittadinAlE 
kaDai vizhi kuLirum kaNakkadanAlE kAmanum ivanukkiNai AmODi oru kAlE
			(madhyamakAlam)
kalaiyellAm orunga vaNattigazha kavinuru tiru uruvODi kAlaiyum kadiravan oLi 
kuLirndu kaDugi naDandaduvODi shaDai muDitta shivanoDu pin toDarnda sharavaNa bhavan 
ivanODi sharavaNa bhavan ivanenil avanukkoru tambiyumuNDODi gambhIramAna
